title: Enhancement: Export standard RDP file
author: padillah
body_snippet:
I'd like the ability to export a standard Windows RDP file usable by Remote Desktop Connection.

comments.snippet:
Should the password be included into the rdp file?
Because if not you could just give them the DNS/IP of the server as they would need to enter the credentials anyway.

Storing the password in the RDP file would be possible but as it's stored in plain text this is really insecure. Even then, the person that wants to run this RDP file would still need to type in a password except they change some GPO setting. See https://serverfault.com/questions/867467/rdp-file-with-embedded-password-asks-for...
